channel.title: Aesthetic Realm [Arrav Base] Duo Slayer, Dung, Dwarf Cannon
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=http://aesthetic-realm.org]http://aesthetic-realm.org[/url] [url=http://aesthetic-realm.org/forums]http://aesthetic-realm.org/forums[/url] [url=http://aesthetic-realm.org/vote]http://aesthetic-realm.org/vote[/url]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WX3oLRuMj3s https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_EM37fCU7RY&feature=youtu.be - No lag, 24-7. - Stable economy. - First server ever to have duo slayer. - Fully Working dwarf multicannon - Perfectly working Hunter - Perfect combat - Revenants - 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others. - Two custom quests. - Full farming - Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc...) - Dungeoneering with mutliple floors - Dicing & Flowergame - Summoning with all familiars - Newest/old hit marks (Can be toggled in the option interface) - Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots - 5 different slayer masters covering over 96 different Slayer monsters. - Full pest control - Full Castle Wars - Full duel arena - Abysall whip vine - Pk points System - Killstreak system - Lottery - Hiscores - Perfect Ancient Curses. - Perfect korasi sword. - Slayer helm fully working - Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape - Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more. - All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working. - Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn. - Advanced teleporting system with jewellery. - Vote4Reward - Active Community with professional forums. - Regular double exp/drops weekend. - Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches. - Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat. - Perfect Switching. - Website based account management system - Regular community events & drop parties. - Bank pins[/CENTER]

item.title: Aesthetic Realm [Arrav Base] Duo Slayer, Dung, Dwarf Cannon
item.dc:creator: @Mrgpn Mrgpn
item.description:
@Mrgpn wrote:

Server had a change of staff.

Absolutely terrible - eco ruined and the attitude of the admin is bad. Encourages flame wars and breaks all server rules

Not recommended for any player.

Read full topic

item.title: Aesthetic Realm [Arrav Base] Duo Slayer, Dung, Dwarf Cannon
item.dc:creator: @aesthetic-realm aesthetic-realm
item.description:
@aesthetic-realm wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:4, topic:543972”]in your advertisement video, you’re no-clipping through walls in your dungeoneering. that’s not professional, and i’m sure people won’t like that.

good luck[/quote]

i did ::noclip so i can get through the wall and not run all the way back, since i did die…

Read full topic

item.description:
@aesthetic-realm wrote:

[CENTER]http://aesthetic-realm.org
http://aesthetic-realm.org/forums
http://aesthetic-realm.org/vote

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WX3oLRuMj3s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_EM37fCU7RY&feature=youtu.be

  • No lag, 24-7.
  • Stable economy.
  • First server ever to have duo slayer.
  • Fully Working dwarf multicannon
  • Perfectly working Hunter
  • Perfect combat
  • Revenants
  • 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others.
  • Two custom quests.
  • Full farming
  • Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc…)
  • Dungeoneering with mutliple floors
  • Dicing & Flowergame
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • Newest/old hit marks (Can be toggled in the option interface)
  • Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots
  • 5 different slayer masters covering over 96 different Slayer monsters.
  • Full pest control
  • Full Castle Wars
  • Full duel arena
  • Abysall whip vine
  • Pk points System
  • Killstreak system
  • Lottery
  • Hiscores
  • Perfect Ancient Curses.
  • Perfect korasi sword.
  • Slayer helm fully working
  • Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape
  • Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more.
  • All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working.
  • Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers
  • All npcs have a good variety of drops.
  • Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn.
  • Advanced teleporting system with jewellery.
  • Vote4Reward
  • Active Community with professional forums.
  • Regular double exp/drops weekend.
  • Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches.
  • Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat.
  • Perfect Switching.
  • Website based account management system
  • Regular community events & drop parties.
  • Bank pins[/CENTER]
